item.description:
Hi, let's continue our great discussions! We'll watch or listen to a movie clip and have everyone share their insights or just listen and take it all in. What a wonderful feeling to have a "calm" with all the uncertainty out there...

We also discussed bringing in any books you have read that have helped you or made an impact on you relating to our subject and would like to share.

It's always at the same location in Scarborough for now and if you're new we'll send you the address. We look forward to seeing familiar and new faces.
See you then!---Caryn
item.name: Law of Attraction
